Texts.Eng: <other> is <adjective>. Love, <questGiver>
Texts.Por: <other> é <adjective>. Com amor, <questGiver>

Texts.Eng: <other> is a loser! Let's be friends!
Texts.Por: <other> é um perdedor! Vamos ser amigos!

Texts.Eng: <other> is out of the picture, and now me and <target> are friends! This friendship will no doubt be useful - thanks for making it happen.
Texts.Por: <other> está fora fora de cogitação, e agora eu e <target> somos amigos! Essa amizade, sem dúvida, seja útil - obrigado por fazer isso acontecer.

Texts.Eng: <questGiver>'s rumour mill
Texts.Por: Boato de <questGiver>

Texts.Eng: <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> accepted my friendship! And who wouldn't? Thank you for helping me out!
Texts.Por: <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> aceitou a minha amizade! E quem não gostaria? Obrigado por me ajudar!

Texts.Eng: <target> abandoned <other> and accepted my friendship! A new friend will certainly come in handy.
Texts.Por: <target> abandonou <other> e aceitou a minha amizade! Um novo amigo certamente virá a calhar.

Texts.Eng: <target> and ^orange;<other>^white; have been friends for a long time. Now <target> will finally become Floran's friend inssstead! Floran's plan is for you to ^green;tell ^orange;<target>^green; how terrible <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> friend isss.^white; Floran already prepared this ^orange;note^white; for^green; you to deliver.
Texts.Por: <target> e ^orange;<other>^white; têm sido amigos por muito tempo. Agora <target> vai finalmente se tornar amigo de Floran em vez disso! O plano de Floran é para você ^green;dizer a ^orange;<target>^green; quão terrível <target.pronoun.possessiveDet>amigo é.^white; Floran já preparou esta ^orange;nota^white; para^green; você entregar.

Texts.Eng: <target>, just to let you know, <other> secretly <verb2> <object>. Sorry.
Texts.Por: <target>, só para você ficar sabendo, <other> secretamente <verb2> <object>. Desculpa.

Texts.Eng: Amused. I think it's safe to say <other>'s social life is in tatters!
Texts.Por: Divertido. Eu acho que é seguro dizer que a vida social de <other> está destruída!

Texts.Eng: Callous. Once you ^green;give ^orange;<target> ^green;this rumour I've written about ^orange;<other>, ^white;<target.pronoun.subject> won't be able to resist telling everyone!
Texts.Por: Insensível. Assim que você ^green;der a ^orange;<target> ^green;este rumor que eu escrevi sobre ^orange;<other>, ^white;<target.pronoun.subject> não será capaz de resistir a contar para todo mundo!

Texts.Eng: Delighted. That rumour fanned the flames magnificently! <other> isn't going to have many friends left after this.
Texts.Por: Satisfeito. Esse boato espalhou as chamas magnificamente! <other> não vai ter muitos amigos restando depois disso.

Texts.Eng: Devious. I want to get closer to <target>, but <target.pronoun.subject> only has eyes for <other>. I bet that will change once you ^green;give ^orange;<target>^green; this ^orange;note^white; ^green;about ^orange;<other>^white;... Then <target> will have time for me!
Texts.Por: Desonesto. Eu quero chegar mais perto de <target>, mas <target.pronoun.subject> só tem olhos para <other>. Aposto isso vai mudar, quando você ^green;der a^orange;<target>^green; esta ^orange;nota^white; ^green;sobre ^orange;<other>^white;... Então <target> vai ter tempo para mim!

Texts.Eng: Devious. Lastly, I will need you to ^green;give this ^orange;note^green; to ^orange;<target>. ^white;<target.pronoun.capitalSubject> definitely won't want to speak to ^orange;<other> ^white;anymore after reading this...
Texts.Por: Desonesto. Por último, vou precisar que você ^green;de essa ^orange;nota^green; para ^orange;<target>. ^white;<target.pronoun.capitalSubject> definitivamente não vai mais quer falar com ^orange;<other> ^white;depois de ler isto...

Texts.Eng: Elated. I have no doubt that with <other> out of the way, <target> and I will become great friends!
Texts.Por: Alegre. Não tenho dúvidas de que com <other> fora do caminho, <target> e eu vamos se tornar grandes amigos!

Texts.Eng: Envious. I want to be friends with <target>, but <target.pronoun.subject> spends all <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> time with <other>. But what if ^orange;<other> had a horrible secret? ^green;Give this ^orange;note^green; to ^orange;<target>^white;... <target.pronoun.capitalSubject>'ll surely reconsider their friendship after reading this...
Texts.Por: Invejoso. Eu quero ser amigo de <target>, mas <target.pronoun.subject> gasta todo <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> tempo com <other>. Mas e se ^orange;<other> tivesse um segredo horrível? ^green;Dê esta ^orange;nota^green; para ^orange;<target>^white;... <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> vai certamente considerar sua amizade depois de ler isto...

Texts.Eng: Finally, let's make ^orange;<target> ^white;realise that I'm better friend material than ^orange;<other>. ^green;Show <target.pronoun.object> this ^orange;note^green; that I've written^white; about <other> and <target.pronoun.subject>'ll see the light!
Texts.Por:
Finalmente, vamos fazer ^orange;<target> ^white;perceber que eu sou um amigo ideal melhor do que ^orange;<other>. ^green;Mostre a <target.pronoun.object> esta ^orange;nota^green; que eu escrevi^white; sobre <other> e <target.pronoun.subject> 
vai perceber!

Texts.Eng: First Floran needs to befriend <target>. Floran knows how friendship works, there's only so much room in people's hearts! We need to make sure <target> stops being friends with that pesssky ^orange;<other>^white;! ^green;Deliver this ^orange;note^white; to ^orange;<target>^white;. It describes the ugly truth about <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> so called friend.

Precisamos de ter a certeza que <target> deixe de ser amigo daquele irritante ^orange;<other>^white;! ^green;Entregue esta ^orange;nota^white; para ^orange;<target>^white;. Ela descreve a verdade feia sobre <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> assim chamado amigo.

Texts.Eng: Floran hass acquired a new friend! Thiss is a lovely day for Floran!

Texts.Eng: Floran hass great plan to befriend <target>. However, Floran's future friend is alwayss seen with ^orange;<other>^white;. You need to tell ^orange;<target>^white; how nasssty <other> is! Please ^green;deliver this ^orange;note^white; that Floran prepared.
Texts.Por: Floran tem um grande plano para fazer amizade com <target>. Contudo, o amigo futuro de Floran é sempre visto com ^orange;<other>^white;. Você precisa dizer a ^orange;<target>^white; o quão desagradável <other> é! Por favor ^green;entregue esta ^orange;nota^white;que Floran preparou.

Texts.Eng: Floran is pleasssed that the plan was successful! Floran's sure that <target> is grateful we told <target.pronoun.object> the truth about <other>.

Texts.Eng: Good job! Now Floran'sss and <target>'s friendship will truly blossom.

Texts.Eng: Here's a ^orange;note^white; I wrote about ^orange;<other>^white;. Everyone knows <other.pronoun.subject>'s terrible, but still ^orange;<target>^white; hangs out with <other.pronoun.object> every day. It's my time to be ^green;<target>'s friend! ^green;Please deliver this note to <target.pronoun.object>.
Texts.Por: Aqui está uma ^orange;nota^white; que eu escrevi sobre ^orange;<other>^white;. Todo mundo sabe o quão terrível <other.pronoun.subject> é, mas ^orange;<target>^white; ainda continua saindo com <other.pronoun.object> todo dia. Texts.Eng: Hey <target>, I hate to give you bad news but <other> is <adjective>.
Texts.Por: Ei <target>, Eu odeio dar más notícias, mas <other> é <adjective>.

Texts.Eng: I didn't help <questGiver> in <questGiver.pronoun.possessiveDet> attempt to sabotage <target>'s friendship. It wasn't a very nice plan, anyway.

Texts.Eng: I failed to spread rumours about <other> to <target>. Maybe <questGiver> should learn to make friends by being kind?
Texts.Por: Eu falhei em espalhar rumores sobre <other> para <target>. Talvez <questGiver> deva aprender a fazer amigos ao ser gentil?

Texts.Eng: I guess I never really knew them after all. Let's hang out!
Texts.Por: Eu acho que eu realmente não o conhecia depois de tudo. Vamos sair!

Texts.Eng: I think <target> and I would make good friends, but <target.pronoun.subject>'s always hanging out with horrible ^orange;<other>^white;. Texts.Por: Eu quero que <target> deixe de ser amigo de ^orange;<other>^white; e torne-se meu amigo. Aqui está uma ^orange;nota^white; que eu escrevi com a verdade sobre <other> nela. ^green;Por favor, entregue ela para ^orange;<target>^white; para mim!

Texts.Eng: I was unable to assist in <questGiver>'s plot to ruin <target>'s friendship. It was a mean plan, so I won't lose sleep over abandoning it.

Texts.Eng: I wish ^orange;<target>^white; would become my friend instead of ^orange;<other>'s^white;. Texts.Eng: I've seen ^orange;<target>^white; hang out with that stupid <other> a lot recently. I want <target.pronoun.object> to hang out with me! ^green;Deliver this ^orange;note^green; to <target.pronoun.object>^white; and <target.pronoun.subject> will realise what a waste of time <other> is.

Texts.Eng: Impressed. <target> looked horrified when <target.pronoun.subject> read the message! Not that I was hiding and watching <target.pronoun.object> or anything. Anyway, there's work to do yet!

Por favor entregue-a para mim!

Texts.Eng: Malicious. I'll teach ^orange;<other>^white; a lesson <other.pronoun.subject> won't soon forget. ^green;Give this rumour I've written to ^orange;<target>^white;, then we can sit back and watch the fireworks.
